amendment.description: To amend the Lobbying Disclosure Act of 1995 to extend coverage to all executive branch employees.

action.text: Amendment SA 2937 ruled out of order by the chair.

Amendment SA 2937 proposed by Senator Lott for Senator Inhofe. (consideration: CR S2491-2493; text: CR S2493) To amend the Lobbying Disclosure Act of 1995 to extend coverage to all executive branch employees.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2937 proposed by Senator Lott for Senator Inhofe.
